titles.title: Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow refunds of Federal motor fuel excise taxes on fuels used in mobile mammography vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/7/2015--Introduced. Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the motor fuel excise tax fuel used in any highway vehicle designed exclusively to provide mobile mammography services.
